alert.note: Alert for Bayamon; Carolina; Catano; Guaynabo; Loiza; San Juan; Trujillo Alto (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flash Flood Warning issued September 19 at 5:39AM ADT until September 19 at 7:30AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLASH FLOOD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 630 AM AST THIS MORNING FOR BAYAMON, CAROLINA, CATANO, GUAYNABO, LOIZA, SAN JUAN AND TRUJILLO ALTO COUNTIES... At 439 AM AST, Radar estimates and rain gauges indicated heavy rain across the warned area. Between 3 and 6 inches of rain have fallen. Additional rainfall amounts of up to 1 inch are possible in the warned area. Flash flooding is already occurring. HAZARD...Life threatening flash flooding. Heavy rain producing flash flooding. SOURCE...Gauges reported. IMPACT...Life threatening flash flooding of creeks and streams, urban areas, highways, streets and underpasses. FLASH FLOOD...GAUGE INDICATED FLASH FLOOD DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE EXPECTED RAINFALL RATE...0.25-1 INCH IN 1 HOUR
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be especially cautious at night when it is harder to recognize the dangers of flooding.

area.areaDesc: Bayamon; Carolina; Catano; Guaynabo; Loiza; San Juan; Trujillo Alto
